name: Saving Rekam Emag
description:
Rekam Emag lives in a world that is falling apart.

This world is so strange but now isn't the time to ponder. Rekam will guide you through this harsh world and show you what needs to be done.

Save this world and fix the mysterious issue that tears the world apart.

Controls:

Keyboard and mouse are needed to play

WASD/Arrow Keys for certain parts of the game

This game was made as a part of the 27th GM48 Jam - 'Countdown'
